articles.author: Lauran Neergaard
articles.title: A study questions melatonin use and heart health but don’t lose sleep over it - AP News
articles.description: Don't lose sleep over headlines linking melatonin to heart failure. That's the message after some scary-sounding reports about a preliminary study involving the sleep-related supplement. A study being presented at an American Heart Association meeting used in…
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) Dont lose sleep over headlines linking melatonin to heart failure.
